name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install concurrently --legacy-peer-deps && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install @angular/cli@16.2.0 @angular-devkit/build-angular@16.2.0 --save-dev && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install @angular/cli@16.2.0 @angular-devkit/build-angular@16.2.0 --save-dev && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.render:build: npm run install:all && npm run build
